name: MultiRole
description: Base class to manage permissions for the derived class.

functionDecorators.name: addMember
functionDecorators.description: Adds `newMember` to the shared role, `roleId`. Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, shared role or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

functionDecorators.name: getMember
functionDecorators.description: Gets the current holder of the exclusive role, `roleId`. Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, exclusive role.

functionDecorators.name: holdsRole
functionDecorators.description: Whether `memberToCheck` is a member of roleId. Reverts if roleId does not correspond to an initialized role.

functionDecorators.name: removeMember
functionDecorators.description: Removes `memberToRemove` from the shared role, `roleId`. Reverts if `roleId` does not represent an initialized, shared role or if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId`.

functionDecorators.name: resetMember
functionDecorators.description: Changes the exclusive role holder of `roleId` to `newMember`. Reverts if the caller is not a member of the managing role for `roleId` or if `roleId` is not an initialized, exclusive role.
